page.title: 18CHILDREN'S VIEW OF ARMAGH
page.content: Armagh: City of Legends Centre of Holiness Historic and Fascinating Lively and Contented Once ruled by Queen Macha Old and New City of Violence City of Tranquility Philip Traynor -------------------------------------- {A}rmagh city placed on seven hills {R}esting place of well-known king {M}acha the Queen in all her frills {A}rrayed in her glory lived out at the Ring {G}reat man built spires,reach up to the sky {H}ope for the future is everyone's cry Darren Pickering --------------------------------------
